FULL TITLE : AN ACT PROHIBITING THE PRACTICE OF LABOR CONTRACTUALIZATION AND PROMOTING REGULAR EMPLOYMENT
ABSTRACT : Aims to protect and uphold workers’ rights to decent and long-term employment by protecting their security of tenure, declaring illegal all forms of contractual employment and penalizing those who will continue to carry out this anti-worker scheme.
